name: Witch Hat Atelier Themed Ita Bag
description: A fan made Witch hat Atelier themed ita bag! Beautiful embroidery and so worth it.
note: Bought a year ish over ago and never regretted it always adding more merch to it and love to show it off!.

name: Qifrey and Olruggio Sticker Trans Pride
description: Decently sized Quifrey and Olruggio sticker! Really well made and cute to show off pride!
note: Is bigger then I expected at this time it is sold out.

name: brushbuddy bookmark
description: A bookmark in the shape of a BrushBug! Super cute and even has a tassle on its hat!.

name: Grimoire Bag
description: Canvas tote with Grimoire print — durable for conventions and daily use.
note: Handles are reinforced and the art holds up to washing.

name: Charm Keychain
description: A little copper keychain with a hat charm — great for keys or zippers.
note: Tiny but sturdy; the clasp is solid.

name: Sticker Pack: Atelier
description: A set of durable vinyl stickers for water bottles and laptops.
note: Colors are vibrant and they are waterproof.

name: Apprentice Scarf
description: A cozy scarf with a subtle pattern inspired by the manga.

name: Pocket Grimoire Notebook
description: A small lined notebook with a hard cover — great for notes and cosplay props.
note: Sturdy cover and I like the paper quality.
